CREDITS

Nicolas P. Rougier

I am deeply indebted to Nicolas P. Rougier who, in his fantastic and incredibly useful post on GTD and Org-Mode, graciously shared the stylesheet for his own site, much of which I have either adapted or adopted for this site. I so dearly love the beautiful simplicity and minimalism of his site, which draws the reader in and presents the valuable information he shares in a way that's free from distraction, that I was simply unable to find a substantive change to make which would improve upon the orginal. Layout, typeset, and colors are all his creation; deceptively simple, yet profound!

While I have adapted it for my own purposes, if you visit his site (here) you will see just how unoriginal I am! Thank you, Nicolas, not only for your excellent article ("GET THINGS DONE WITH EMACS"), but for your impeccable design, taste, and generousity.

His article and design are written under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 international license, so feel free to use it, and be sure to give credit to him (not to me).
